Edit

In this Article

IaasVMRestoreRequest(String, Nullable<RecoveryType>, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, Nullable<Boolean>, EncryptionDetails) IaasVMRestoreRequest(String, Nullable(Of RecoveryType), String, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, Nullable(Of Boolean), EncryptionDetails)

Edit

Initializes a new instance of the IaasVMRestoreRequest class.

public IaasVMRestoreRequest(string recoveryPointId = null, RecoveryType? recoveryType = null, string sourceResourceId = null, string targetVirtualMachineId = null, string targetResourceGroupId = null, string storageAccountId = null, string virtualNetworkId = null, string subnetId = null, string targetDomainNameId = null, string region = null, string affinityGroup = null, bool ? createNewCloudService = null, EncryptionDetails encryptionDetails = null)Public Sub New(recoveryPointId As String = Nothing, recoveryType As RecoveryType? = Nothing, sourceResourceId As String = Nothing, targetVirtualMachineId As String = Nothing, targetResourceGroupId As String = Nothing, storageAccountId As String = Nothing, virtualNetworkId As String = Nothing, subnetId As String = Nothing, targetDomainNameId As String = Nothing, region As String = Nothing, affinityGroup As String = Nothing, createNewCloudService As Boolean? = Nothing, encryptionDetails As EncryptionDetails = Nothing)
Parameters
recoveryPointId
String String

ID of the backup copy to be recovered.

recoveryType
Nullable<RecoveryType> Nullable(Of RecoveryType)

Type of this recovery. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'OriginalLocation', 'AlternateLocation', 'RestoreDisks'

sourceResourceId
String String

Fully qualified ARM ID of the VM which is being recovered.

targetVirtualMachineId
String String

This is the complete ARM Id of the VM that will be created. For e.g. /subscriptions/{subId}/resourcegroups/{rg}/provider/Microsoft.Compute/virtualmachines/{vm}

targetResourceGroupId
String String

This is the ARM Id of the resource group that you want to create for this Virtual machine and other artifacts. For e.g. /subscriptions/{subId}/resourcegroups/{rg}

storageAccountId
String String

Fully qualified ARM ID of the storage account to which the VM has to be restored.

virtualNetworkId
String String

This is the virtual network Id of the vnet that will be attached to the virtual machine. User will be validated for join action permissions in the linked access.

subnetId
String String

Subnet ID, is the subnet ID associated with the to be restored VM. For Classic VMs it would be {VnetID}/Subnet/{SubnetName} and, for the Azure Resource Manager VMs it would be ARM resource ID used to represent the subnet.

targetDomainNameId
String String

Fully qualified ARM ID of the domain name to be associated to the VM being restored. This applies only to Classic Virtual Machines.

region
String String

Region in which the virtual machine is restored.

affinityGroup
String String

Affinity group associated to VM to be restored. Used only for Classic Compute Virtual Machines.

createNewCloudService
Nullable<Boolean> Nullable(Of Boolean)

Should a new cloud service be created while restoring the VM. If this is false, VM will be restored to the same cloud service as it was at the time of backup.

encryptionDetails
EncryptionDetails EncryptionDetails

Details needed if the VM was encrypted at the time of backup.

Properties

AffinityGroup AffinityGroup

Edit

Gets or sets affinity group associated to VM to be restored. Used only for Classic Compute Virtual Machines.

public string AffinityGroup { get; set; }Public Property AffinityGroup As String
Value
String String

Edit

Gets or sets should a new cloud service be created while restoring the VM. If this is false, VM will be restored to the same cloud service as it was at the time of backup.

public bool ? CreateNewCloudService { get; set; }Public Property CreateNewCloudService As Boolean?
Value
Nullable<Boolean> Nullable(Of Boolean)

EncryptionDetails EncryptionDetails

Edit

Gets or sets details needed if the VM was encrypted at the time of backup.

public EncryptionDetails EncryptionDetails { get; set; }Public Property EncryptionDetails As EncryptionDetails
Value
EncryptionDetails EncryptionDetails

Edit

Gets or sets ID of the backup copy to be recovered.

Value
String String

Edit

Gets or sets type of this recovery. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'OriginalLocation', 'AlternateLocation', 'RestoreDisks'

public RecoveryType? RecoveryType { get; set; }Public Property RecoveryType As RecoveryType?
Value
Nullable<RecoveryType> Nullable(Of RecoveryType)

Region Region

Edit

Gets or sets region in which the virtual machine is restored.

public string Region { get; set; }Public Property Region As String
Value
String String

SourceResourceId SourceResourceId

Edit

Gets or sets fully qualified ARM ID of the VM which is being recovered.

public string SourceResourceId { get; set; }Public Property SourceResourceId As String
Value
String String

StorageAccountId StorageAccountId

Edit

Gets or sets fully qualified ARM ID of the storage account to which the VM has to be restored.

public string StorageAccountId { get; set; }Public Property StorageAccountId As String
Value
String String

SubnetId SubnetId

Edit

Gets or sets subnet ID, is the subnet ID associated with the to be restored VM. For Classic VMs it would be {VnetID}/Subnet/{SubnetName} and, for the Azure Resource Manager VMs it would be ARM resource ID used to represent the subnet.

Value

TargetDomainNameId TargetDomainNameId

Gets or sets fully qualified ARM ID of the domain name to be associated to the VM being restored. This applies only to Classic Virtual Machines.

Value
String String

Value
